WorkItem.ClosedComment: Open a new issue if you find a new repro case.
WorkItem.Description:
Running the optimization, will come 2k short of the current equipment dps. This issue does not occur when Arcane Light is disabled.
Â 
Related issue: Arcane Light will often fail at finding any upgrades when clicking "Build Upgrade List", even when some upgrades are obvious Direct Upgrades. This issue sometimes happens with Arcane Light disabled, but less frequently.
WorkItem.Summary: [Mage][4.1.5.0] Optimization instability with Arcane Light enabled

Comments.Message: I wasn't able to reproduce this with the dev build, could be related to numerical stability improvements that were made since the last release.
